nowFilms.name: Underdog
nowFilms.genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
nowFilms.plot: A Beagle must use his newly-bestowed superpowers to defend Capitol City from mad scientist Simon Barsinister.

nowFilms.name: Honest Thief
nowFilms.plot: Wanting to lead an honest life, a notorious bank robber turns himself in, only to be double-crossed by two ruthless FBI agents.

nowFilms.name: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
nowFilms.plot: Three years into the Clone Wars, the Jedi rescue Palpatine from Count Dooku. As Obi-Wan pursues a new threat, Anakin acts as a double agent between the Jedi Council and Palpatine and is lured into a sinister plan to rule the galaxy.

nowFilms.name: Deadpool
nowFilms.plot: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

nowFilms.name: Bruce Almighty
nowFilms.plot: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.

nowFilms.name: Bad Boys for Life
nowFilms.plot: Miami detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett must face off against a mother-and-son pair of drug lords who wreak vengeful havoc on their city.

nowFilms.name: Sausage Party
nowFilms.plot: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.

nowFilms.name: A Dog's Purpose
nowFilms.plot: A dog looks to discover his purpose in life over the course of several lifetimes and owners.

nowFilms.name: Apollo 11
nowFilms.plot: A look at the Apollo 11 mission to land on the moon led by commander Neil Armstrong and pilots Buzz Aldrin and Michael Collins.

nowFilms.name: Kiss the Ground
nowFilms.plot: A revolutionary group of activists, scientists, farmers, and politicians band together in a global movement of "Regenerative Agriculture" that could balance our climate, replenish our vast water supplies, and feed the world

soonFilms.name: The Game Changers
soonFilms.plot: A UFC fighter's world is turned upside down when he discovers an elite group of world-renowned athletes and scientists who prove that everything he had been taught about protein was a lie.

soonFilms.name: American Factory
soonFilms.plot: In post-industrial Ohio, a Chinese billionaire opens a factory in an abandoned General Motors plant, hiring two thousand Americans. Early days of hope and optimism give way to setbacks as high-tech China clashes with working-class America.

soonFilms.name: The Blue Lagoon
soonFilms.plot: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

soonFilms.name: Gone Girl
soonFilms.Plot: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

soonFilms.name: The Revenant
soonFilms.plot: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

soonFilms.name: After
soonFilms.plot: A young woman falls for a guy with a dark secret and the two embark on a rocky relationship. Based on the novel by Anna Todd.

soonFilms.name: Mary
soonFilms.plot: A family looking to start a charter-boat business buys a ship that holds terrifying secrets once out on isolated waters.

soonFilms.name: The Grudge
soonFilms.plot: An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.

soonFilms.name: Gretel & Hansel
soonFilms.plot: A long time ago in a distant fairy tale countryside, a young girl leads her little brother into a dark wood in desperate search of food and work, only to stumble upon a nexus of terrifying evil.

soonFilms.name: The Nun
soonFilms.plot: A priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate the death of a young nun in Romania and confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

soonFilms.name: 100% Wolf
soonFilms.plot: 100% Wolf centers on Freddy Lupin, heir to a proud family line of werewolves. Positive he'll become the most fearsome werewolf ever, Freddy is in for a shock when his first "warfing" goes awry, turning him into a ferocious - poodle.

soonFilms.name: Woody Woodpecker
soonFilms.plot: The hyperactive red-headed bird enters a turf war with a big city lawyer wanting to tear down his home in an effort to build a house to flip.

soonFilms.name: Ferdinand
soonFilms.plot: After Ferdinand, a bull with a big heart, is mistaken for a dangerous beast, he is captured and torn from his home. Determined to return to his family, he rallies a misfit team on the ultimate adventure.

soonFilms.name: Pets United
soonFilms.plot: A group of spoilt, selfish pets led by glamour cat Belle are stranded in their luxury hangout 'Pampered Pets,' when the machines that run Robo City, the hypermodern metropolis that they live in, go wild and take over.
